discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: Thanks for the changelog, CI green

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: @affeldt-aist more than one month without any comment, you can probably merge

discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment:

Indeed. There is however a conflict in the changelog.

review_discussion.author: proux01
review_discussion.comment:
I find `pred_omap` more natural. It feels to me as an option map on predicates.
But I suck at monads, so you might still be right.

review_discussion.author: affeldt-aist
review_discussion.comment: I am not sure either but I have a doubt because of the mismatch between the name and the contents of the definition.

review_discussion.author: proux01
review_discussion.comment: I agree, let's go for `pred_oapp` then.
